DOC.brief_summary: This trial aims to compare the endomicroscopic image quality and sedation efficacy of propofol or midazolam with fentanyl.
DOC.brief_title: Propofol Versus Midazolam With Fentanyl for EGD Endomicroscopy
DOC.criteria: outpatients attending endomicroscopy able to give written informed consent GI tract malignancy coagulopathy acute upper digestive tract bleeding pregnancy or breast feeding allergy to fluorescein sodium impaired renal function
